EmailTemplate.name: Drip - Series 1 - Feb 2015.Email 3 - Hook-Agile
EmailTemplate.subject: Surviving in the Agile Jungle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We all know the tech world is a jungle - time to market is decreasing, continuous cycles are increasing, and agility is the new buzzword. The enterprises that can keep up with consumer demands are the ones who stay on top.
Tricentis’ Tosca Testsuite is designed to equip you with the tools you need to succeed – not just survive – in an agile tech world. Watch our webinar on Tosca Testsuite to learn how you can optimize your risk coverage, manage your test data, and automate your testing efforts to become king of the testing jungle.
Watch the webinar here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-agile-series-3-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=nur>, and as always, feel free to shoot me an email if you have any questions about Tricentis or Tosca Testsuite!
Best regards,
Vincent
Vincent Ruth Western Region Territory Director Tricentis
m - +1.408.568.9698 e - v.ruth@tricentis.com <mailto:v.ruth@tricentis.com>
Visit our Tricentis YouTube Channel <https://www.youtube.com/TRICENTIS> | Gartner Cool Vendor <http://www.tricentis.com/about/what-others-are-saying/gartner> | Tricentis Blog <http://www.tricentis.com/about/blog>
Tricentis 400 S. El Camino Real Suite 1050 San Mateo, CA 94402
